actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2307 of title 10, United States Code, to limit to $20 million the total amount that may be paid in advance on any contract entered into by the Departments of the Army, Navy, and Air Force, the Coast Guard, and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

summary.text: Limits to $20,000,000 the total amount that may be paid in advance on any contract entered into by the Departments of the Army, Navy, and Air Force, the Coast Guard, and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2307)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2307 of title 10, United States Code, to limit to $20 million the total amount that may be paid in advance on any contract entered into by the Departments of the Army, Navy, and Air Force, the Coast Guard, and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
